channel.title: Logs
channel.description: Hello guys, My mate and I are coding a rsps, we have fully working logs. But what's the best solution to make the logs available to the staff team. A command, Dropbox? I really don't know what the best solution is, could you please post here how to do it the best way? Thanks

item.title: Logs
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Logs as in what? Logs for what people say each day? Logs for commands? Logs for trades? Logs for development progress? Be more specific.

chat,ban,drop,trade,mute,…logs

Read full topic

item.title: Logs
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Logs as in what? Logs for what people say each day? Logs for commands? Logs for trades? Logs for development progress? Be more specific.

Read full topic

item.title: Logs
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

It depends on how Private you want them to be. If you don’t care if your Players see it, release it publicly in your community. You could create a Command, yes, but it would probably end up linking them to a Web Address in the end. You could add a G.U.I. feature to do the same thing as well. You can personally send the files to your Staffers if you want. There are many different ways of doing this, you just have to decide which is best for your situation.

Read full topic
